class Error[source]

Error() :: Exception

Base class for other exceptions

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class MultiPyspinError[source]

MultiPyspinError(expression, message) :: Exception

Exception raised in ths module. Attributes: expression -- input expression in which the error occurred message -- explanation of the error

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class CamRemoval[source]
